name: Pie-rates
description:
The intention was that you would fire on enemy ships to sink them, and then you would collect pies for points. Our programmer got tired and since it was made for the Low Effort game jam we decided to make do with what we had instead. Have fun sailing around.

  • Programmer: Jason Tripp
  • Artist: Rowan Corless
  • Producer & Designer: Alexander Jersey
  • Sound: Sheik Skybrook
  • Other Developers: TerruKun & Meghan Corless
